item.title: Microservices - The Easy Way is the Wrong Way
item.description: We had the great opportunity of inviting Sean Whitesell to join us for a virtual Tech Talk in August to share his knowledge on Microservices. Sean is based out of Tulsa, Oklahoma and is a Senior Cloud Architect, ASP Insider, and a Microsoft MVP. For the past nine years, Sean has served as the leader of the Tulsa.NET User Group. Last January, he also published his own book, Pro Microservices in .
